items.title: Android Dev Summit Extended
items.about: Android Dev Summit is taking place on 23/24 November. Let's meet, discuss, watch and learn about Android.

items.location: European Data Innovation Hub Boulevard du Souverain 23, Brussels
items.title: Android Dev Summit Extended
items.about:
The Android Dev Summit will be happening on the 23rd and 24th of November, and all sessions will be live-streamed.



Let's get together to follow this event and discuss about it as it happens!



But also, let's take this opportunity to code and apply the top of the art advices right then and there together. We can follow various codelabs about performance, material design, marshmallow features, or whatever you feel like coding.



So join us to discover what the summit will provide, share the knowledge, and simply have fun.



Please don't forget to register on the Meetup page

items.title: Android: Let's talk about Android Performance with Doug Sillars
items.about:
The event will take place in Google's offices in Brussels, Steenweg op Etterbeek 180, Brussels.



This time we have the chance to have with us Doug Sillars.



Doug Sillars is the author of the book "High Performance Android Apps", he will be there to talk about the importance of Android App Performance.



Don't forget to register on the meetup page

items.title: Belgium Apps for Google
items.about: An afternoon to share and inspire, to connect with Google related user groups in Belgium, to engage and learn.

items.title: Ubiquitous Android
items.about:
We'll be looking at

- the outcome of the Ubiquity Dev Summit in San Francisco

- code labs



It's time to find out about Android in cars, don't you think?

items.title: Building Android
items.about:
We're looking in depth at compilation and generic build setup.
- Gradle for Android
